means: [男子名] 迪米特里厄斯来源于希腊语，含义是“属于谷物女神Demeter的”(belonging to Demeter)

sentence.Network_cn: 海丽娜疯狂地爱着狄米特律斯.

sentence.Network_en: Egeus : Why do you refused to marry Demetrius?
sentence.Network_cn: 你为什么拒绝嫁给狄米崔斯 呢 ?

sentence.Network_en: Egeus : Why do you refused to marry Demetrius? He is really a worthy gentleman!
sentence.Network_cn: 你为什麽拒绝嫁给狄米崔斯 呢 ?他是一个真正的绅士.
